QuestData.Title: Wanding 101
QuestData.Description: We'll start with some wand work. You have your wand with you? Good.$b$bI've set up a number of targets around the hall. Use your wand to hit as many as you can.$b$bAnd no point-blank shots! That's cheating.
QuestData.LogDescription: Practice using your wand on $1oa Wand Targets.
QuestData.CompletionText: You'll never learn if you never practice.
QuestData.RewardText: And... it looks like we're out of time for today's wand practice. Go on, then. Off to your next class!
